casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America v. Ballard GEARHART, Lessee and Operator of the Mount Garfield Coal Mine. No. 1213. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Feb. 18, 1935. Thomas J. Morrissey, U. S. Atty., of Denver, Colo. R. H. Walker, of Denver, Colo., for appellee.

Before LEWIS and PHILLIPS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal (7 F.Supp. 712) dismissed on motion of appellant.
